name: Service and Product Enhancement Code
title: SPEC
definition: Identifies a specific product or service offering.

validEntry.description: Any alpha character except “I” or any

usageNotes: Required when the associated LREF field is populated and the associated LOS field is not populated, otherwise prohibited.
fieldNotes: SPEC may be applicable for virtual service level features and options other than those already identified by the Network Channel (NC) and Network Channel Interface (NCI) codes.
Telcordia Technologies, Inc. is the intellectual property owner and administrator of SPEC. The SPEC code structure and use are outlined in Telcordia Technologies special report SR-2491.
This is an alternative identifier for the level of service performance.
Unique entries are required per UREF.
